modName: Nighteye Ability for all the races
summary: Nighteye ability for all the races.
descriptionHtml:
Remember to endorse it if you like it!

I made this mod for myself because i had a realistic lighting mod by Kurtcop. 
That mod made the dungeons very dark and creepy. 

Other mods that goes well with this one can be found at the bottom. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I added Nighteye as a racial ability for : 

Argonian 
Breton
Dunmer
High elf
Imperial
Khajiit (Well i didn\'t really add this one).
Nord
Orc
Redguard. 
Wood Elf

This does not remove your other racial abilities. 
This is just a simple addon. 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Installation notes : Unpack the file into your Skyrim/Data folder. 

NOTE : If this doesn\'t work for you, try with different characters and pop me
a comment on the issue. 
I almost got 800 Unique subscribers and i\'ve only had 2 reports of it not working. 

How to uninstall it : 
Just remove the ESP file and the CKM file [Nord_nightseye01]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


** Update 1.0.1 **

* Removed NE ability from power and added in lesser power instead. 
* When i had the NE on power you couldn\'t toggle it, and it was set for 1 day usage. 
* Now it works as intended, it\'s in the lesser power category now. So it works with the Felix Fox mod. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Other Mods : 

Creator : Kurtcop
Description : Realistic lighting, this is the reason why i created my mod, the dungeons are dark :)
Link : http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=7648

Creator : Felix Fox.
Description : This mod gives you the option to toggle the nighteye on and off.
Link : http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=7541

Creator : Flare32 
Description : This mod removes the blur you get when using nighteye
Link : http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=7635
author: Stick Collector
